Define Documentation

#define TIMER_RESOLUTION   (1000000UL / (F_CPU / SYSTEM_TIMER_PRESCALER))

Specifies the resolution of the timer used for timers. Depends on processor frequency and the timers available on the selected processor.

Function Documentation

void Timer_CreateConfiguration ( timer_configuration *  configuration,
uint32_t  period,
timer_mode  mode,
completion_handler  completed 
)

Creates a timer by initializing the timer configuration object.

Parameters:
configuration The timer configuration object.
period The period of the timer in units of one microsecond. Use the constant TIMER_RESOLUTION to acquire the actual resolution of the underlying timer.
mode 
completed
